regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <SetViewMode>55</SetViewMode> <title>[COLOR lightgreen][makelist.param1] [/COLOR] [COLOR deepskyblue][makelist.param2] [/COLOR][COLOR lightslategray][makelist.param3] [/COLOR] [COLOR skyblue][B][makelist.param5] [/B] [/COLOR][COLOR lightyellow] [makelist.param6] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightblue][[makelist.param4]] [/COLOR]</title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[hash]&mode=1&name=Teamblue+[makelist.param5]+Arenavision</link> <regex> <name>hash</name> <expres>this.loadPlayer\("(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://cdn1.arenavision.link/$doregex[canal]</page> <referer>http://cdn1.arenavision.link</referer> <setcookie>beget=begetok</setcookie> </regex> <regex> <name>canal</name> <expres>$pyFunction:'[makelist.param6]'.replace('>4','04').replace('>5','05').replace('>6','06').replace('>7','07').replace('>8','08').replace('>9','09').replace('>10','10').replace('>11','tk/11').replace('>12','12').replace('>13','13').replace('>14','14').replace('>15','15').replace('>16','16').replace('>17','17').replace('>18','18').replace('>19','19').replace('>20','20').replace('>21','21').replace('>22','22').replace('>23','23').replace('>24','24').replace('>25','25').replace('>26','26').replace('>27','27').replace('>28','28').replace('>29','29').replace('>30','30').replace('>31','31').replace('>32','32').replace('>33','33').replace('>34','34').replace('>35','35').replace('>1','01').replace('>>2','02').replace('>3','03')</expres> <page></page> </regex> <thumbnail>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/irmu/moria/master/_tools/art/legolas/av.jpg</thumbnail>
